    ClientHandler
    The main server-side class for handling the client connection After initializing the connection, this handler will continously listen for new messages from the client, which will then dispatch to one of the command handlers
    If necessary, it also sends messages to the other users related to this client via the other users' client handlers
    ClientHandlerParameters
    Holds the parameters for this user's connection:
    - user id
    - connection state (and its callback for character card playing)
    - lobby
    - controller
